channel.title: Tut island script part 2
channel.description:
hello, the other day i made a post that asked how to put a tut island script i had onto my server, but i got a reply that said
I don't think that a SCAR script for runescape could work for a private server because every private server is different. So certain parts would mess up.
well i would like to try it anyway but how would i insert it to my server?

item.title: Tut island script part 2
item.dc:creator: @rangergodlv rangergodlv
item.description:
@rangergodlv wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:2, topic:285744”]Use Aryan, which is built into the Moparscape v3.2 client.

You could use SCAR to macro a private server however you would need to write your own personalised script.[/quote]

thats where i got the script but how do i make it work?

Read full topic

item.title: Tut island script part 2
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Use Aryan, which is built into the Moparscape v3.2 client.

You could use SCAR to macro a private server however you would need to write your own personalised script.

Read full topic
